QuestData.Title: Deep Within
QuestData.Description: Who... who are you? Have you come to extract more of my memories?$b$bI'm afraid there aren't any useful ones left, save for the memories of my imprisonment.$b$bOr perhaps you're here for something else?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the prisoner and learn of his situation.
QuestData.RewardText: You could be the key to my freedom. Will you help me, mortal?
